alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Bibb; Hancock; Jasper; Jones; Monroe; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 4:17PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Baldwin, northwestern Bibb, southern Putnam, west central Hancock, southeastern Monroe, Jones and southeastern Jasper Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 417 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Adgateville to near Yatesville, and moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Milledgeville, Eatonton, Forsyth, Gray, Meriwether, Lake Tobesofkee, Bradley, Wayside, Resseaus Crossroads, Round Oak, Russellville, Plant Harlee Branch, Arkwright, Juliette, Ethridge, Bolingbroke, Dames Ferry, Brent, and Clinton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Bibb; Hancock; Jasper; Jones; Monroe; Putnam
